Love Island's Chris Taylor has recreated Caroline Flack 's nude photo drinking wine.

Chris nails the exact pose and setting as he sits on his kitchen counter with his legs crossed, sipping out of a wine glass and holding the bottle in the other hand.

The cheeky chap, who was known for his pranks in the villa, tagged Mrs Hinch, a cleaning influencer.

Love Island's Chris captioned the post: @mrshinchhome know any decent disinfectants?"

"Else I’m gonna need a new kitchen.

"Big mood this @carolineflack

#whoworeitbetter #mood #lambrinigirls #getthesurfacewipesout ".

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

Caroline posted her daring photo last weekend with the caption: "Quite A week .. we’re having a little wrap party".

She showed off her incredible figure in the photo, looking tanned and sipping on a glass of rosé.

The post racked up almost 200,000 likes on Instagram as Caroline's celeb pals including Scarlett Moffat, Emily Atack, Lisa Snowdon and Bobby Norris showed their appreciation with comments and emojis.

(Image: carolineflack/Instagram)

Caroline recently announced she has a new hosting job lined up on Channel 4's brand new surgery show.

The bombshell, 38, will front The Surjury which will document people getting their dream plastic surgery.

In the Channel 4 advert, the show promises to make participates "surgical dreams come true" as it offers people life changing cosmetic surgery for free.
description: The Love Island star recreated Caroline's saucy snap drinking wine on his kitchen counter totally naked
